author: mark
title: Cardano Hackathon Seasons
description: Current Catalyst fund cadence and proposal structure does not incentivize proactive rapid creation and of tools, products or services.
solution: Quarterly Hackathon season that has local and regional competitions with cash prizes, the winners of which participate in the season finale
experience: As Director of Engineering, I ran multiple internal Hackathons to promote innovation, community, and culture building.
